snippet.title: The American Girls Premiere - PC Intro
snippet.description:
Here's a direct link to the game installer: https://mega.nz/file/zkRE0LzZ#23Qsau6ZaFdvkXNO18Q_8swjzBQWTu9xjXFzYGgmGes

You may also download the game here: http://legendsworld.net/adventure/year/1997#2574
RAR password: felicity

Just got myself a copy of this from a friend, as I can't find a working download of this game. The app works on 32-bit versions of Windows, but the installer is 16-bit and so I had to repack it into a new NSIS-based installer for it to be installed on x64 editions of Windows.
